Voucher Terms and Conditions
This voucher is valid for 12 months from the date of issue. TripADeal vouchers cannot be used in conjunction with any other offer. TripADeal vouchers are not valid for use on associated travel services, concierge flight tickets, travel visas, travel insurance, vouchers or any optional extras / supplements / surcharges. TripADeal vouchers cannot be exchanged for cash. All vouchers issued by TripAdeal can only be redeemed by a customer purchasing travel deals directly from TAD, they cannot be redeemed or applied to travel purchased via an intermediary, agent or wholesale partner of TripADeal.
